titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for calling out heretors and fencible men, to attend the King's host
Proclamations. 1692-05-09
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the ninth day of May. And of our reign, the fourth year, 1692.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
